verses.roman:
mahāprabhura āge, āra dekhi' jagannātha
rathe deha chāḍimu,--ei parama-puruṣārtha'

synonyms: mahāprabhura āge—in front of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; āra—and; dekhi' jagannātha—after seeing Lord Jagannātha; rathe—under the cart; deha chāḍimu—I shall give up this body; ei—this; parama-puruṣa-artha—the highest benediction of life.
translation: "After seeing Lord Jagannātha, I shall give up my body under the wheel of the cart in the presence of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu. This will be the highest benediction of my life."
